body:
Hai guys!

Yesterday I was on TeamSpeak with Butter_BrosMC and UltraBubbles, along with MANY other players.

We were on Frostbite, and decided, "Hey, let's make the best defense EVER". So, we did.

This defense, it was so good that we turned it into a country club.

We had a bar, trading room, upperdeck, iron supply, and, best of all, a Jukebox with the "wait" music disc.

That's right! UltraBubbles bought the disc, and we made the Jukebox.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qe5q2n7HH1c

Please remember that this is my first video, and I was mildly sick during it. *Constructive* Criticism appreciated!

title: Red Team's Back-Left Country Club!
